snippet: Russia is an important test case for the balancing act Facebook is undertaking in countries that have traditionally heavily regulated, if not censored, their media.
abstract: Facebook co-founder Mark Zuckerberg meets with Russian Prime Min Dmitri A Medvedev in Moscow; Russia is an important test case for the balancing act Facebook is undertaking in countries that have traditionally heavily regulated, if not censored, their media.
lead_paragraph: Russia is an important test case for the balancing act Facebook is undertaking in countries that have traditionally heavily regulated, if not censored, their media.

headline.seo: Zuckerberg Visits Russia and Meets With Medvedev
headline.main: Zuckerberg Meets With Medvedev in a Crucial Market
headline.print_headline: Zuckerberg Meets With Medvedev in a Crucial Market
